name: citycoin
description: A smart contract implementation of the Proof of Transfer consensus mechanism, allowing for the mining and Stacking of a new fungible token on the Stacks blockchain with a portion of miner rewards going to a custodied account for a city to claim the protocol contribution.

scripts.test: npm run test:cities && npm run test:base && npm run test:misc
scripts.test:cities: npm run test:mia && npm run test:nyc
scripts.test:mia: npm run test:mia:auth && npm run test:mia:core && npm run test:mia:token
scripts.test:mia:all:v1: npm run test:mia:auth:v1 && npm run test:mia:core:v1 && npm run test:mia:core:v1:patch && npm run test:mia:token:v1
scripts.test:mia:all:v2: npm run test:mia:auth:v2 && npm run test:mia:core:v2 && npm run test:mia:token:v2
scripts.test:mia:auth: npm run test:mia:auth:v1 && npm run test:mia:auth:v2
scripts.test:mia:core: npm run test:mia:core:v1 && npm run test:mia:core:v1:patch && npm run test:mia:core:v2
scripts.test:mia:token: npm run test:mia:token:v1 && npm run test:mia:token:v2
scripts.test:nyc: npm run test:nyc:auth && npm run test:nyc:core && npm run test:nyc:token
scripts.test:nyc:all:v1: npm run test:nyc:auth:v1 && npm run test:nyc:core:v1 && npm run test:nyc:core:v1:patch && npm run test:nyc:token:v1
scripts.test:nyc:all:v2: npm run test:nyc:auth:v2 && npm run test:nyc:core:v2 && npm run test:nyc:token:v2
scripts.test:nyc:auth: npm run test:nyc:auth:v1 && npm run test:nyc:auth:v2
scripts.test:nyc:core: npm run test:nyc:core:v1 && npm run test:nyc:core:v1:patch && npm run test:nyc:core:v2
scripts.test:nyc:token: npm run test:nyc:token:v1 && npm run test:nyc:token:v2
scripts.test:base: npm run test:base:auth && npm run test:base:core && npm run test:base:token
scripts.test:misc: npm run test:misc:tardis && npm run test:misc:utils && npm run test:misc:vote && npm run test:misc:vrf
